title: webpage: navigate on source code
body:
by **eduardo.ramalho**: 
This issue is only about an improvement request to the hosted Golang project webpage. It
is NOT an issue with Go.

Golang source code is hosted on "code.google.com/p/go/".
On that webpage click on link called "Code Search".
Try to search for some function on Go source code.
Select any found file and open it on browser.

The improvement request is while visualizing that source code, it would be great if we
could click on a Go (or even C) function or variable, and navigate to other section or
file where it is declared.

The objective is to help get an insight on Golang source code (packages, compiler,
runtime).

For a reference, there is other project where I can see this working
(“code.google.com/p/chromium/”).
